titles.title: To combat forced organ harvesting and trafficking in persons for purposes of the removal of organs, and for other purposes.
To combat forced organ harvesting and trafficking in persons for purposes of the removal of organs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
